comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Perhaps Patrick E. McCabe, a "boss" of the Democratic Party in Albany. See, for example, NYT, June 19, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A01EFD8113CE633A... "ALBANY, June 18. -- Political history will be made rapidly within the next week, and if the threats of Patrick E. McCabe, the Democratic boss of Albany and the other organization leaders are fulfilled, it will be made at the expense of Gov. Sulzer."

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq: Thanks.  We'll include McCabe's fuller info. in the source data next time we update.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started a biography in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patrick_E._McCabe
